entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:18 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 11:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm inland. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over Grand Manan Island early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
